mapper.select: select m.rno flag, ltel, r.rno rno, sdno , day , tseq , date_format(r.time, '%H:%i') as time , r.cid , lname, addr1, map_x, map_y, tid from routes r left outer join malm m on r.RNO = m.rno , lcts l where r.cid=l.cid and r.sdno=#{value} and date_format(r.time, '%M-%D')=date_format(now(), '%M-%D') order by r.tseq
select count(distinct day) from routes where sdno=#{scheduleNo}
mapper.delete: delete from routes where sdno=#{scheduleNo} and day=#{day}
mapper.update:
update routes
set time=date_add(time, interval +1 day), day = day+1
set time=date_add(time, interval -1 day), day = day-1
where sdno=#{route.scheduleNo} and day>=#{route.day}
